help-file.title: FORRESTAL
help-file.content:
A Forrestal is a multi-class Ranger/Druid.
Notes on Forrestal: Rangers use spellbooks, and memorize spells. Druids commune, which is heavilly based on terrain, for both spells and commune times. If you start as a Druid, you will commune all your spells. If you start as a Ranger, you will memorize all your spells, and you will need spellbooks for BOTH your druid and your ranger spells.
